content.question: Rufus wanted to go to college after high school, but he did not go because he was afraid it would be too much work. For years he has considered going to college but he still fears that it will be too hard. Eventually he feels so unhappy that he goes to see a therapist, who follows the theory of humanistic personality. The therapist is most likely to explain Rufus's unhappiness as being a result of

choices.label: his inability to properly resolve the identity versus role confusion stage of development
having repressed his memories of failing tests as a child
a mismatch between his ideal self and his real self

content.answer: a mismatch between his ideal self and his real self

topic.text: 4.4: Psychodynamic and Humanistic Theories of Personality

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
